attributes.action: Ed Milliband should worry about his own Party!
attributes.additional_details: I have grown tired of listening to 'Red Ed' slating all other parties as well as private business.  However, there is no talk of what his party are doing or even would do! I would like Ed to keep quiet unless he is able to explain what he and his party or are doing to assist in fixing the latest issue he has come to slate! Alternatively we could ban him from public appearances and limit his appearances in the commons?
